original_text: Manasseh built again the altars on the hills that his father Hezekiah had destroyed. He built altars for people to worship Baal. He also made an Asherah pole, as King Ahab of Israel had done. He bent down low to worship all the stars in the sky.
korean_text: 그의 아버지 히스기야가 헐어 버린 산당들을 다시 세우며 이스라엘의 왕 아합의 행위를 따라 바알을 위하여 제단을 쌓으며 아세라 목상을 만들며 하늘의 일월 성신을 경배하여 섬기며

sentences.original_text: Manasseh built again the altars on the hills
sentences.korean_translation: 므낫세가 다시 언덕 위에 제단들을 쌓았습니다

sentences.original_text: that his father Hezekiah had destroyed
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 그의 아버지 히스기야가 파괴했던 것들입니다

sentences.original_text: He built altars for people to worship Baal
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들이 바알을 숭배하게 할 제단들을 쌓았습니다

sentences.original_text: He also made an Asherah pole
as King Ahab of Israel had done
He bent down low to worship all the stars
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 별들을 숭배하기 위해 깊이 숙였습니다
